author: Ania Bessonov
title: Germ-zapping robots: Your COVID-19 questions answered
description: We're answering your questions about the pandemic. Send yours to COVID@cbc.ca and we’ll answer as many as we can. We'll publish a selection of answers every weekday online, and also put some questions to the experts during The National and on CBC News Network.
content:
We're breaking down what you need to know about the pandemic by answering your questions. You can send your questions via email at COVID@cbc.ca
 and we'll answer as many as we can. We'll publish a selection of answers every weekday on our website, and we're … [+7128 chars]
